entity_mention.mention_text: a few Hillary supporters posting here whom I respect highly
those who do not care for Hillary
anyone who disagrees with what we can make out of Hillary's policies
anyone who does not support her
a few thin-skinned Hillary supporters who call everyone who point out their problems w/her record "haters
everyone who point out their problems w/her record
